column4: in ubuntu karmic, I can't hear sound on my speaker while my guitar plug in on my line-in, but in jaunty I can. is some clue here?
Did you check the audio settings with alsamixer or the gnome sound mixer?
Just because you checked it doesnt mean you configured it correctly
You might need to enable line in or maybe there is a physical issue
I try to configured it corectly, because I can record my guitar sound
Might also be a pulseaudio issue, not sure
